Some information and links about my hobbies :-)

Algorithmic and programming

I regularly participate in algorithmic competitions:

  • Participation in the contests “Meilleur développeur de France 2018, 2019 (Finalist)”
  • 1st irish team of the “ACM ICPC United Kingdom and Ireland Programming Contest 2013”
  • Finalist of the “Gosucoder National Coding Challenge 2013” organized by the company Guidewire

Sports

I do trails and a bit of road running for fun but also in competitions. Here are some nice races in French-County or nearby:

  • Le semi-marathon du lion de Belfort
  • Wings for Life
  • La ronde du Salbert
  • Trail du pont Sarrazin
  • Trail des bornes

Music/Reading/Video Games/…

I have been playing guitar for about fifteen years and bass guitar recently in a small cover band.

I am always up for a game of Age of Empires 2, Team Fortress 2, Rocket League, Battlefront 2 and many others…

Join me on Steam ;-)

Some great books I love and recommend (for SF and heroic fantasy lovers):

  • The Witcher/Le Sorceleur by Andrzej Sapkowski
  • The Dark Tower/La Tour Sombre by Stephen King
  • Foundation/Fondation by Isaac Asimov
  • Thrawn Trilogy/La Croisade Noire du Jedi Fou by Thimothy Zhan
  • La Horde du Contrevent by Alain Damasio
  • The Belgariad/La Belgariade by David Eddings
